title: Jim Sciutto: "The Shadow War"
description: Michael's conversation with CNN's Jim Sciutto, author of "The Shadow War: Inside Russia's and China's Secret Operations to Defeat America." Original air date 28 May 2019. The book was published on 14 May 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Jim Sciutto)
